and every time I walk into a room, I feel silly.

translation.en: No, ma'am.
Hasn't had any sex.

I was diagnosed with dyslexia in the eighth grade.
I faked it for the doctors, but I'm really just dumb.
translation.es: Lo fingí para los médicos,pero, en realidad, solo soy tonto.

translation.en: I never really told anybody.

translation.en: You're probably all surprised.
-No, I'm not surprised. -Nope.
-You surprised? -[laughs] No.
But Hubie uses big words, and they come out so natural for him.

translation.en: It pisses me off.
Oh, 'cause of the dumb thing.
My brother-in-law once said that I had no ambition.
translation.es: Mi cuñado me dijo una vezque yo no tenía ambiciones.

translation.en: And then he bit me, and I became a werewolf.
translation.es: Luego me mordió, y me volví hombre lobo.

translation.en: You see?
Hubie's smart, has nice hair, and sex hope.

translation.en: But to me,
his best quality is this.
He can weather all of your insults and your thrown objects,
translation.es: Aguanta que lo insulten y le tiren cosas,

translation.en: and he responds with humor and-- and kindness.
translation.es: y responde a eso con humor y bondad.

translation.en: Could you say the same?

translation.en: You see, Hubie. True bravery's being kind.
